mapper.select: select * from( select rownum rn,d.id,b.REALNAME,b.sex,d.stuts,a.housingquantity,e.item purpose,a.MONEY,c.item LONGTIME,NVL((select round((select sum(money) from TB_INVESTMENTLIST where TENDID=d.id)/(select money from TB_BORROW where id=a.id)*100,1) from dual),0) jin from TB_BORROW a join TB_REALNAME b on a.REALID=b.id join TB_SYSTEMCATEGORYITEM c on a.LONGTIME=c.id join TB_SYSTEMCATEGORYITEM e on e.id=a.purpose join TB_TENDERING d on a.id=d.borrow where rownum <#{end} ) e where rn >#{start} and e.stuts =48 or e.stuts =2
select count(*) from TB_TENDERING a join tb_borrow b on a.id=b.id where a.stuts =48 or a.stuts =2
